articles.title: 'Mass incoming': Notre Dame AD addresses fan surge in Clemson post-game amid COVID-19 spike in area - USA TODAY
articles.description: Notre Dame limits seating to 20% capacity, tickets sold to students, faculty, staff, players' families. They are supposed to follow several protocols.
